description: The international human rights legislation has been formally extended to Guernsey and Alderney.
title: Guernsey approves United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child
title_page: Guernsey approves United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child - BBC News
maintext: "It is a great step and we want to thank everyone who has worked hard on seeing this Convention extended to Guernsey and Alderney and the work already done by children in school to understand their rights," she said.
